Key Match Events: Mexico defeated New Zealand 2-1 in the match
Pre-Game Insights: Mexico were favored with odds of $1.33 to win, while New Zealand had odds of $7.00 to win or $4.50 for a draw
Ben Old, a midfielder, was noted as a player to watch for New Zealand after moving to Saint-Etienne in France
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was New Zealand's first outside Oceania since March 2023
Mexico extended their winning streak against New Zealand with this victory
